title: Ravens expectations, McLaurin Contract, NFC West, Offseason concerns, and Kyler vs Lamar
itunes:title: Ravens expectations, McLaurin Contract, NFC West, Offseason concerns, and Kyler vs Lamar
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with Lamar Jackson and Kyler Murray showing up for team minicamps. Hosts Kyle Brandt, Will Selva, Tom Pelissero and Fmr NFL DB Darius Butler discuss what the Ravens will do while Darius has Baltimore winning the AFC North.  The Commanders are in another tough spot as WR Terry McLaurin wants a new deal.  We move onto the NFC West and how the Niners will rebound if Trey Lance takes over as QB1.  After looking at offseason storylines the crew is not worried about, we put Kyler vs Lamar in several scenarios we are likely to see this season.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
